channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:22 Drive alarm to the Zolotonsky district.Creb
item.description: 游릭 04:22 Drive alarm to the Zolotonsky district.Creb This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 03:31 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 03:31 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
